subject: Public Speaking
title: Martin Luther King Jr.
description: A 60-second lesson on Martin Luther King Jr..

hook.text: I have a dream that one day this nation will live its true creed.

buildup.text: King combined biblical language, vivid imagery, and moral urgency.

discovery.text: His speech used anaphora to build rhythm and emotional momentum.

twist.text: King's delivery was inseparable from his words.

climax.text: One speech changed the trajectory of American civil rights.

punchline.text: Vision, rhythm, and moral clarity create immortal speeches.
